org.keysupport.encoding.der.structures

Class IssuerAndSerialNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keysupport.encoding.der.structures.IssuerAndSerialNumber

  • public class IssuerAndSerialNumber
extends Object
    Per: RFC3852 
         IssuerAndSerialNumber ::= SEQUENCE {
       issuer Name,
       serialNumber CertificateSerialNumber }
 
     CertificateSerialNumber ::= INTEGER
    Version:
    $Revision: 33 $
    Author:
    tejohnson
